WorkItem.Description:
I get the feeling that the Pet Dps is currently quite a bit too high. Have compared with the spreadsheet which has around 1200dps compared to 1800-1900 in Rawr.
Have not been able to pinpoint yet where the difference comes from, but will see if I can narrow it down a bit.... with some tests and buff comparison.

Comments.Message: Can you please supply your RAWR saved file so that we can analyse your situation.
You can use the file from http://rawr.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=15447
This happened between 2.3.1 and 2.3.2. My pet dps jumped from about 1000 to over 1800 (MM spec).

Commit 44349 should fix the issue, the Pet Happiness multiplier was being applied improperly (and some other multipliers were a little off, but those were minor). Can you confirm a more reasonable output Drizz?
Yes, looks much better. Issue can be closed.
